title: Nijigaku’s Live! Day 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Everyone! Are you ready for the live!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeaaah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I can’t wait for the curtain to go up.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’ve eaten so many Takoyaki, so I’m at full power~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai will never forget the view from the Symbol Tower~. But there’s an even better view from above the stage that’s waiting for us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Just thinking of it is making me shiver.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m so touched that we have this many fans even in Osaka!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>And they’re all looking forward to me leading the Nijigaku live, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Like Kasumin said, we’re not being led by you, Lanzhu-senpai.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>How many times have we had this conversation? I’m sure this puppy would be content right away if you call her cute, Lanzhu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s always the pattern, isn’t it~. Shall we advertise it as one of our trademarks?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmph! Kasumin is not that easy, Miako, Kanata-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu will do my best until Kasumin accepts me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What kind of me do you want to get accepted by?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>The cute and adorable Kasumi, of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hnnn~~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It always goes the same way, just like a chemical reaction. Kanata-san is right. This is basically a trademark of Nijigaku, on par with Osaka’s specialties.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Well, I guess that is a good part of Kasumi-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>H-, hey everyone! The curtain is about to rise soon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s go share our love with the people of Osaka!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>And let’s show them how much we’ve improved thanks to their support!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
